question_text: Huda left her map at home, so she wasn’t able to enjoy the trip in the forest. The sentence which has a similar meaning to the one above is ………………………

choices.A: If Huda hadn’t left her map at home, she couldn’t enjoy the trip in the forest.
choices.B: If Huda had left her map at home, she could have enjoyed the trip in the forest.
choices.C: If Huda had left her map at home, she couldn’t enjoy the trip in the forest.
choices.D: If Huda hadn’t left her map at home, she could have enjoyed the trip in the forest.
